name: Spicy Bean and Beef Pie
author: Kristie Milam

ingredients.name: (11 1⁄2 oz.) can condensed bean with bacon soup, undiluted
(16 oz.) jar thick and chunky picante sauce, divided
(16 oz.) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
(16 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
Pastry for double crust pie (10 inches)
(2 1/4 oz.) can sliced ripe olives, drained

instructions: In a skillet, cook beef and garlic until beef is browned; drain. In a large bowl, combine soup, 1 cup picante sauce, cornstarch, parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix well. Fold in beans, 1 1/4 cup of cheese, 1/2 cup onion and the beef mixture. Line pie plate with bottom pastry; fill with bean mixture. Top with remaining pastry; seal and flute edges. Cut slits in the top crust. Bake at 425° for 30 to 35 min- utes, or until lightly browned. Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting. Garnish with sour cream, olives and remaining picante sauce, cheese and onions.
